## useSDK() function

## Example

```javascript
const sdk = useSDK();
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useSDK(): Web3sdksSDK | undefined;
```

**Returns:**

Web3sdksSDK \| undefined

Access the instance of the web3sdks SDK created by the Web3sdksProvider to call methods using the connected wallet on the desiredChainId.
